metadata.title: CVE-2020-13935 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The payload length in a WebSocket frame was not correctly validated in Apache Tomcat 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.0-M6, 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.36, 8.5.0 to 8.5.56 and 7.0.27 to 7.0.104. Invalid payload lengths could trigger an infinite loop. Multiple requests with invalid payload lengths could lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.0.37-3').
